election_record.label: Vermont 1816 Lieutenant Governor

overview.note: The Original Election Returns tally sheet, The Northern Sentinel (Burlington, VT), The National Standard (Middlebury, VT), The Christian Herald (Middlebury, VT), The Vermont Republican (Windsor, VT) and North Star (Danville, VT) report 17,124 votes for Paul Brigham.

sub_unit.name: Caledonia
sub_unit.note: The Original Election Returns tally sheet lists 1080 votes for Paul Brigham in Caledonia County; however, the sum of totals per town is 1090.

sub_unit.name: Essex
sub_unit.note: The Original Election Returns aggregate votes tally sheet lists 4 scattering votes in Essex County; however, the tally sheet for Essex County only has 2 scattering votes.

election_record.reference: Original Election Returns. Vermont State Archives, Middlesex.
